343390.name: Elementary My Dear Majesty!
343390.description: Step into a stunning make-believe world in the first 3D hidden object adventure!  The king's daughter has turned into a man-eating monster, and either you find the cure, or it's off with your head!  Put your keen powers of observation to work as you search 14 eye-popping locations for clues, perform tasks for a variety of comical characters, and solve over 100 cunning puzzles.  If you enjoy original and exciting games, Elementary My Dear Majesty is for you!
343390.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 日语, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 瑞典语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
